description: For a partition P of a positive integer, let f(P) be the product of k+1, over all parts k in P. Let a(n,r) be the sum of f(P) over all partitions P of n with smallest part r. Sequence gives table of a(n,r) for 1 <= r <= n, in the order a(1,1); a(2,1), a(2,2); a(3,1), a(3,2), a(3,3); ...
